definition: to steal sb's valuable item and substitute a similar-looking but worthless item/to sell a fake for the genuine article/to palm off

sentences.english: Well done, Sister Mary switched over the babies all by herself.
sentences.chinese: 幹得好，瑪麗修女自己一個人就把嬰兒掉包了。

sentences.english: The switch is one long continuous movement.
sentences.chinese: 掉包是一個漫長循環的過程。
